===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[stupid]], [[foolish]], [[unwise]]; [[stupidity]], [[foolishness]]
#: {{zh-x|愚蠢 之 人，不足 多 誅。|The '''unwise''' are not worthy of excessive punishment.|CL|ref=Houhanshu}}
#: {{zh-x|你 看 她，大家 都 叫 她「愚蠢 的 老太婆」。|Look at her; everyone calls her "'''stupid''' old hag".}}
